name: planted.chicken
description: Juicy, fibrous, and extra crispy strips made from natural ingredients. Perfect as a topping or snack.
longDescription: Crispy on the outside, tender on the inside. Our planted.chicken Crispy Strips deliver that satisfying crunch you've been craving. Made from peas and rapeseed oil with a golden coating, they're perfect for salads, wraps, or straight from the pan as a delicious snack.
ingredients: Water, pea protein (22%), rapeseed oil, wheat flour, breadcrumbs, pea fiber, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Pan-fry or bake at 200°C for 8-10 minutes until golden and crispy. Serve with your favorite dipping sauce.

steps.title: Choose
steps.description: Pan-fry for crispier or bake at 200°C for easier.

steps.title: Dip
steps.description: Golden and crispy. Serve with your favorite sauce.
